name: Ravenia Castle- Alpha Test Demo v1.1
name_original: Ravenia Castle- Alpha Test Demo v1.1
description:
Journey into the forlorn Castle Malvornan, the infamous Ravenia Castle, to save your beloved from a terrible fate! Increase your odds of success and survival by finding others to join you on your quest through the vast castle!

--ALPHA DEMO INFORMATION--

The game is currently  completed up to the chapel but only as far as the East Wing Guest Hall has been scripted, though if you are clever enough, you can find some secrets to gain access to other test areas! Only Ceriah's story mode has been scripted so far with events and sprites, her brother, Alastair, is only playable within the tavern and outside the tavern.

The RTP has also been included in the demo.

Tilesets originally created by REFMAP, which were made to be of free use as long as credit is given. Sprites for the main cast were made on charas-project.net, with some minor edits by me. These sprites will be replaced in time with ones made from scratch.

The game is compatible with any Windows system, I am not sure if it'll run on Mac as I do not own a Mac PC... 

This game is made purely out of a passion for art and gaming!

I hope you enjoy the demo!
